glsa.title: Nagstamon: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Nagstamon could expose user credentials to a remote attacker.

background.p: Nagstamon is a Nagios status monitor application.

description.p: Nagstamonâ€™s automatic request to check for updates includes plaintext username and password information for one of the monitor servers that the Nagstamon instance connects to.

impact.p: A remote attacker could eavesdrop on this request and gain user credentials for a monitor server.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Nagstamon users should upgrade to the latest version:
